changeSet.sql: Update rpt_ByPeriods_Indicators set goodsType_id=2 where measureName='avgWeight' Update rpt_ByPeriods_Indicators set goodsType_id=2 where measureName='mmlPrice' Update rpt_ByPeriods_Indicators set goodsType_id=2 where measureName='grossProfitCoef' Update rpt_ByPeriods_Indicators set goodsType_id=2 where measureName='ReturnLimit' Update rpt_ByPeriods_Indicators set goodsType_id=2 where measureName='ExceedingReturnLimit' Update rpt_ByPeriods_Indicators set goodsType_id=2 where measureName='ContactSalarySales'
